item.title: 企业采用人工智能，收入前景乐观，Palantir 股价大涨
item.description: Palantir 在盘前交易中股价大涨超过 18%，此前该公司预测全年营收乐观，原因是企业对其软件和数据分析服务的需求强劲，竞相采用生成式人工智能。【原文：Palantir shares rallied over 18% in premarket trading after it forecast upbeat annual revenue fueled by strong demand for its software and data analytics services from businesses racing to adopt generative AI.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛扩大重组计划，裁员 7000 人，销售额实现增长
item.description: 雅诗兰黛（Estee Lauder）周二扩大了其重组计划，其中包括裁员多达 7000 人，并公布第二季度销售额降幅小于预期。【原文：Estee Lauder on Tuesday expanded its restructuring plan that would include up to 7,000 job cuts and posted smaller-than-expected drop in second-quarter sales.】

item.title: 特朗普关税大戏对美国汽车制造商和汽车买家都有重大影响
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）让一些全球最大的汽车制造商猜测，美国总统是否会兑现威胁，对他们的汽车和供应链征收进口税，这可能会导致美国消费者的汽车价格大幅上涨。【原文：Donald Trump is keeping some of the world’s biggest automakers guessing whether the U.S. president will follow through on threats to slap their vehicles and supply chains with import taxes that could cause hefty vehicle-price spikes for U.S. consumers.】

item.title: 由于苏打水和零食需求疲软，百事公司预计年度利润低于预期
item.description: 周二，百事可乐公司（Pepsico）预计全年利润低于预期，季度收入不及预期，原因是该公司最大的市场美国对其汽水和零食的需求减弱。【原文：Pepsico forecast annual profit below expectations and missed quarterly revenue estimates on Tuesday, as the Frito-Lay maker faces weakening demand for its sodas and snacks in the U.S., its largest market.】

item.title: 早间新闻：特朗普关税 "魅影 "在中国愈发真实
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 中国回应美国关税，期货走低
item.description: 在中国对世界最大经济体征收报复性关税后，投资者远离风险资产，周二美国股指期货小幅走低。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were slightly lower on Tuesday as investors stayed away from risky assets after China deployed retaliatory tariffs against the world's biggest economy.】

item.title: Spotify 预测利润高于预期，原因是用户增长和提价
item.description: Spotify 周二预测第一季度利润将高于市场预期，因为这家瑞典音频流巨头受益于稳定的用户增长、价格上涨和成本削减行动。【原文：Spotify forecast first-quarter profit above market estimates on Tuesday as the Swedish audio-streaming giant benefits from steady user growth, price hikes and a cost-cutting drive.】

item.title: 冯德莱恩表示，欧盟将做好与美国进行艰难谈判的准备
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周二表示，欧盟将做好与美国进行艰难谈判的准备，以保护自身利益免受贸易关税提高的威胁。【原文：The European Union will be ready for tough negotiations with the United States to protect its own interests against the threat of heightened trade tariffs, EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国迅速回击美国关税，股市和美元跌跌不休
item.description: 由于中美两国在关税问题上针锋相对，引发了更广泛的破坏性贸易冲突的幽灵，周二美国股票期货和美元下跌，香港股市从两个月高点下滑。【原文：U.S. stock futures and the dollar fell on Tuesday, while Hong Kong shares slipped from two-month highs, as the U.S. and China went tit-for-tat on tariffs and raised the spectre of a broader, damaging trade conflict.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚石油公司 NIS 请求美国财政部豁免制裁 90 天
item.description: 塞尔维亚能源部周二表示，由俄罗斯天然气工业石油公司（Gazprom Neft）和俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）控股的塞尔维亚石油公司（NIS）已向美国财政部提交了一份正式申请，要求在90天内免除对其的制裁。【原文：Serbian oil company NIS, which is majority-owned by Russia's Gazprom Neft and Gazprom , has submitted a formal request to the U.S. Treasury Department for a waiver of sanctions for 90 days, Serbia's energy ministry said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 与首席执行官戈贝蒂分道扬镳后，菲拉格慕股价下滑
item.description: 意大利奢侈品集团 Ferragamo 周二宣布，其首席执行官 Marco Gobbetti 将在执掌集团三年多一点的时间后于下月离职，随后该集团股价下滑超过 5%。【原文：Ferragamo shares slide more than 5% on Tuesday after the Italian luxury group announced that its chief executive Marco Gobbetti would leave next month after little over three years in charge.】

item.title: 从尊尼获加到科罗娜啤酒，大型酒类企业可能面临关税打击
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对来自墨西哥、加拿大和中国的商品全面征收新关税之后，尊尼获加威士忌和科罗娜啤酒等酒精饮料的制造商可能会被卷入一场潜在的贸易战。【原文：Makers of alcoholic beverages such as Johnnie Walker whisky and Corona beer could be caught in the crosshairs of a potential trade war after U.S. President Donald Trump imposed sweeping new tariffs on goods from Mexico, Canada and China.】

item.title: 华比与沃尔沃合作推出自动驾驶卡车
item.description: 自动驾驶技术公司Waabi周二表示，它已与卡车制造商沃尔沃的无人驾驶系统部门合作，开发和部署可自动驾驶的大型钻机。【原文：Self-driving technology company Waabi said on Tuesday it has partnered with truckmaker Volvo's driverless systems unit to develop and deploy big rigs that drive themselves.】

item.title: 中国新限制出口的五种关键金属是什么？
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国商品征收 10%的额外关税生效几分钟后，中国于周二宣布了针对国防、清洁能源和其他行业使用的五种金属的全面出口限制措施。【原文：China announced sweeping export restrictions on Tuesday targeting five metals used across defence, clean energy and other industries minutes after an additional 10% tariff on Chinese goods imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump came into effect.】

item.title: 关税可能在下半年给帝亚吉欧造成 2 亿美元的损失
item.description: 帝亚吉欧财务总监尼克-詹哈尼（Nik Jhangiani）周二表示，如果美国在3月份对墨西哥和加拿大实施关税，帝亚吉欧估计其营业利润可能会减少约2亿美元，并补充说，公司已经制定了抵消影响的策略。【原文：Diageo estimates its operating profit could be dented by roughly $200 million if U.S. tariffs on Mexico and Canada are implemented in March, its finance chief Nik Jhangiani said on Tuesday, adding it had strategies to offset the impact.】

item.title: 美国加征关税后，中国扩大关键矿产出口管制
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国商品征收 10%额外关税生效几分钟后，中国于周二宣布对国防、清洁能源和其他行业使用的五种金属实施全面出口限制。【原文：China announced sweeping export restrictions on Tuesday on five metals used across defence, clean energy and other industries, minutes after an additional 10% tariff on Chinese goods imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump came into effect.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司一月份销量下降 5
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车公司周二表示，1月份的销量同比下降了5%，为50,820辆。【原文：Volvo Cars' sales fell by 5% year-on-year in January to 50,820 cars, the Sweden-based automaker said on Tuesday, adding that the decrease was largely due to the timing of the Chinese New Year.】

item.title: 中国的关税报复针对美国适度的能源进口
item.description: 中国是世界第一大能源进口国，但其从美国购买的能源相对较少，这削弱了中国政府周二对进口美国原油、液化天然气（LNG）和煤炭征收报复性关税的影响。【原文：China is the world's top energy importer but its purchases from the United States are relatively modest, blunting the impact of Beijing's move on Tuesday to slap retaliatory tariffs on imports of U.S. crude oil, liquefied natural gas (LNG) and coal.】

item.title: 中国限制战略矿产出口
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国商品征收 10%的额外关税生效几分钟后，中国于周二宣布了针对国防、清洁能源和其他行业使用的五种金属的全面出口管制措施。【原文：China announced sweeping export controls on Tuesday targeting five metals used across defence, clean energy and other industries, minutes after an additional 10% tariff on Chinese goods imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump came into effect.】

item.title: 沃达丰第三季度在德国的业绩恶化
item.description: 欧洲移动通信集团沃达丰（Vodafone）报告称，其最大市场德国的业绩在第三季度再次出现下滑，在英国、土耳其和非洲市场表现强劲的情况下，德国的业绩却出现了疲软。【原文：European mobile group Vodafone reported another deterioration in Germany, its biggest market, in its third quarter, a weak point amid otherwise stronger trading in Britain, Turkey and Africa.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧撤销中期销售预测
item.description: 世界顶级烈酒制造商帝亚吉欧周二撤销了中期有机销售增长目标，理由是宏观经济和地缘政治的不确定性影响了公司的复苏步伐。【原文：Diageo , the world's top spirits maker, withdrew its medium-term organic sales growth target on Tuesday, citing macroeconomic and geopolitical uncertainty hurting the pace of its recovery.】

item.title: 诺基亚与 AT&T 就语音和自动化签署多年扩展协议
item.description: 美国电信运营商AT&T和芬兰网络设备制造商诺基亚周二表示，双方已签署一项多年期扩展协议，以升级AT&T在美国的语音传输和5G网络自动化。【原文：U.S. telecoms operator AT&T and Finnish network equipment maker Nokia have signed a multi-year expansion agreement to upgrade AT&T's voice carriage and 5G network automation in the U.S., the Finnish company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 松下电池部门第三季度营业利润同比增长 39
item.description: 日本松下控股公司（Panasonic Holdings）周四表示，由于美国工厂的盈利能力提高以及储能系统的销售强劲，为特斯拉供应电池的能源部门第三季度营业利润同比增长了 39%。【原文：Japan's Panasonic Holdings said on Thursday the third-quarter operating profit of its energy unit, which supplies batteries to Tesla , rose 39% from a year earlier on improved profitability at its U.S. plant and stronger sales of energy storage systems.】

item.title: 达索系统与大众汽车签署战略合作协议
item.description: 法国软件集团达索系统（Dassault Systemes）周二宣布与大众汽车（Volkswagen）建立长期合作伙伴关系，以加速这家德国汽车制造商向软件定义汽车的转型。【原文：French software group Dassault Systemes on Tuesday announced a long-term partnership with Volkswagen to accelerate the German carmaker's transition towards software defined vehicles.】

item.title: 任天堂将 Switch 全年销量预期下调至 1100 万台
item.description: 日本任天堂周二将老旧的 Switch 游戏机的全年销量预期下调了 12%，降至 1100 万台，以迎接今年推出的后继设备。【原文：Japan's Nintendo cut its full-year sales forecast on Tuesday for the aging Switch console by 12% to 11 million units ahead of the launch of a successor device this year.】

item.title: 阳狮集团预测 2025 年增速放缓，但仍有信心实现超额收益
item.description: 全球市值最大的广告集团阳狮集团周二宣布，预计 2025 年的有机增长率为 4% 至 5%，与 2024 年超出预期的强劲表现相比略有放缓。【原文：Publicis , the world's largest advertising group by market capitalization, announced on Tuesday it expects organic growth of 4% to 5% in 2025, a slight slowdown compared to the robust performance in 2024 that exceeded expectations, propelled by its data-driven targeted marketing.】

item.title: Amundi 因推出规避风险的产品，第四季度资金流入与预期持平
item.description: 欧洲最大的基金管理公司 Amundi 周二公布，由于今年最后三个月对风险规避型产品的需求依然强劲，该公司的季度资金流入量与上一季度持平。【原文：Amundi , Europe's biggest fund manager, posted in-line quarterly inflows on Tuesday, as demand for risk-averse products remained strong over the last three months of the year.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行第四季度业绩超预期，但下调未来一年利润目标
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）报告称，由于其投资银行家的交易活动激增，该银行第四季度的净收入出现了超出预期的大幅增长，但该银行下调了 2025 年的关键利润目标，并表示将进一步削减成本。【原文：France's BNP Paribas reported a forecast-beating jump in net income in the fourth quarter as its investment bankers rode a surge in trading activity, but the lender lowered a key profit target for 2025 and said it would cut costs further.】

item.title: 聚焦：投资者寻求诺和诺德新一代肥胖症药物 CagriSema 的答案
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）正承受着来自投资者的压力，要求获得更多有关其下一代肥胖症候选药物 CagriSema 的信息，因为试验结果不明确，导致其股价在 12 月份遭受重创。【原文：Novo Nordisk is under pressure from investors for more information about its next-generation obesity drug candidate CagriSema amid a lack of clarity over trial results that hammered its shares in December.】

item.title: 软件公司达索系统发布 2025 年展望
item.description: 法国软件公司达索系统（Dassault Systemes）周二以其竞争定位为由，预测 2025 年的总收入将增长 6% 至 8%，高于去年 5% 的增幅。【原文：French software company Dassault Systemes on Tuesday forecast total revenue growth of between 6% and 8% for 2025, above the 5% rise seen last year, citing their competitive positioning.】
